title: Smooth Air Dry Anti-Frizz Cream, Smooth Hair WITHOUT FRIZZ | Garnier Fructis Style
description: Discipline frizz without the heat for smooth and shiny hair. Smooth Air Dry Anti-Frizz Cream controls frizz and holds hair's natural shape while you air dry your hair. Lightweight, fast-absorbing, paraben-free formula, with argan oil from Morocco.

asset.author: GarnierUSA
asset.description:
Discipline frizz without the heat for smooth and shiny hair. Smooth Air Dry Anti-Frizz Cream controls frizz and holds hair's natural shape while you air dry your hair. Lightweight, fast-absorbing, paraben-free formula, with argan oil from Morocco.


Learn more about Smooth Air Dry Anti-Frizz Cream: http://www.garnierusa.com/products/styling/sleek-and-smooth-hair-styling/smoothing-and-shine/smooth-air-dry-anti-frizz-cream.aspx

Learn more about hair style: http://www.garnierusa.com/products/styling.aspx
